Package se.arkalix.core.plugin.cp

Interface ArTrustedContractNegotiatorPluginFacade

  • All Superinterfaces:
    se.arkalix.plugin.PluginFacade
    public interface ArTrustedContractNegotiatorPluginFacade
extends se.arkalix.plugin.PluginFacade
    Facade allowing for contract negotiations to be carried out with state management support.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • listen

        void listen​(java.lang.String receiverName,
            java.util.function.Supplier<TrustedContractNegotiatorHandler> handlerFactory)
        Listens for incoming contract offers to a certain receiver.

        More specifically, this method sets the factory method invoked to create a new negotiation handler whenever an offer is received that is not associated with an existing negotiation session. If no factory method is set, such offers are ignored.

        Parameters:
        receiverName - Name of offer receiver.
        handlerFactory - Function called to create a new negotiation handler every time a contract offer not associated with an existing negotiation session is received.

      • offer

        se.arkalix.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Long> offer​(se.arkalix.core.plugin.cp.TrustedContractOfferDto offer,
                                                        TrustedContractNegotiatorHandler handler)
        Starts new contract negotiation by making given offer and then uses provided negotiation handler to handle any response from the party receiving the offer.
        Parameters:
        offer - Contract offer to make.
        handler - Handler used to track and react to any acceptance, rejection or counter-offers made by the party receiving the offer.
        Returns:
        Future completed successfully with a unique negotiation identifier if the offer could be submitted to its intended receiver, or a proxy acting for it.

      • offer

        default se.arkalix.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Long> offer​(java.lang.String offerorName,
                                                                java.lang.String receiverName,
                                                                java.time.Duration validFor,
                                                                java.util.List<se.arkalix.core.plugin.cp.TrustedContractDto> contracts,
                                                                TrustedContractNegotiatorHandler handler)
        Starts new contract negotiation by making the described offer and then uses provided negotiation handler to handle any response from the party receiving the offer.
        Parameters:
        offerorName - Name of offer sender.
        receiverName - Name of offer receiver.
        validFor - The duration from the current time for which the offer is to remain valid.
        contracts - Offered contracts.
        handler - Handler used to track and react to any acceptance, rejection or counter-offers made by the party receiving the offer.
        Returns:
        Future completed successfully with a unique negotiation identifier if the offer could be submitted to its intended receiver, or a proxy acting for it.
        See Also:
        Package documentation for details about names
